scripts.start:golden-layout: concurrently -k "npm run build:watch -w @holochain-playground/simulator" "npm run build:watch -w @holochain-playground/elements" "npm start -w @holochain-playground/golden-layout"
scripts.start:cli: npm run build:happ && npm run build && cross-env ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently -k "npm run start:happ" "npm run dev:cli"
scripts.start:happ: RUST_LOG=warn hc s -f=$ADMIN_PORT generate tests/happ/workdir/test_playground.happ --run=8888 network  mdns
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dna && hc app pack tests/happ/workdir
scripts.build:dna: npm run build:zome && hc dna pack tests/happ/workdir
scripts.build:zome: cd tests/happ && CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown
